Specifications.Materials:
[body] Schoeller® stretch-woven nylon with NanoSphere® Technology - 80 gsm, 93% nylon, 7% elastane
[lining] Nylon woven mesh - 65 gsm, 100% nylon
Bluesign approved fabric
Specifications.Insulation: PrimaLoft® Silver Insulation Active - 60 gsm, 100% polyester
Specifications.Pockets:
[exterior] 2 concealed-zip hand pockets
[internal] Stows in internal chest pocket with carabiner clip loop
Specifications.Recommended Use: Mid-Layering, Climbing, Trekking, All-Season Mid Layer Adventures, Skiing, Around Town
